description_for_human: 99 accessible React components with three themes, design tokens, and user-controlled motion. Built on Radix UI + Tailwind CSS.
description_for_model: Sage Design Engine provides 99 accessible React components organized into 11 categories (actions, forms, navigation, overlays, feedback, data-display, layout, backgrounds, cursor, motion, blocks). Features three themes (Studio, Terra, Volt) with light/dark modes, a user-controlled motion system (0-10 scale), and comprehensive design tokens. Built on Radix UI + Tailwind CSS with TypeScript strict mode.
